bibl.title: Greek and Demotic Texts from the Zenon Archive
bibl.note: xvi-291 pp. et 1 tabl. dépl.; - [vii] pp. et XXX pll.
Nos. 1—13 are bilingual Greek and Demotic papyri; nos. 14—76 Greek papyri. Appendix nos. A—F.
bibl.seg: Pestman Pieter Willem (edited under the general direction of), Greek and Demotic Texts from the Zenon Archive. Text; - Plates. (Papyrologica Lugduno-Batava. XXA; - XXB.)
Leiden, E.J. Brill, 1980, 4°, xvi-291 pp. et 1 tabl. dépl.; - [vii] pp. et XXX pll.

C.R. par R.S. Bagnall, BASP 18 (1981) pp. 89-91. - J. Bingen, ChrEg 56 (1981), No. 112, pp. 370-372. - L. Criscuolo, Aegyptus 61 (1981) pp. 269-272. - Jirí Cvetler, Eirene 20 (1983) pp. 163-165. - Heinz Heinen, Gnomon 56 (1984) pp. 516-519. - R. Jasnow, JEA 71 (1985), Reviews Supplement, p. 71. - L. Migliardi Zingale, Iura 31 (1980) pp. 257-258. - G. Nachtergael, BibO 38 (1981) coll. 611-612. - E. Van 't Dack, RHD 50 (1982) pp. 71-72. - Kar-Theodor Zauzich, OLZ 82 (1987) coll. 249-251.
